alert.note: Alert for Wilkes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:48AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wilkes County through 915 AM EDT... At 847 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maple Springs, or near Wilbar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Wilkesboro... Wilkesboro... Wilbar... Mc Grady... Windy Gap... Mulberry... and Stone Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
